Articles.Content: A lot of these planet plugins look pretty sweet, but there's one thing I'm wondering. Would it be possible to include a planet with a highly tilted axis like Uranus? For that matter, do bodies in the stock game even have any tilt to their axis (axes?)?
No it is not possible to have a axial tilt, none of the planets in the stock game have a tilt. But this might be a plan for the future of kerbal
Nope. Its not even possible with mods atm.
Mu said he'd ask about having it in .24. I haven't heard since.

Mu said he'd ask about having it in .24. I haven't heard since.

I'm sure we'll get it.

Just as soon as they fix SOI transition errors during time warps.

Or fixing the thrust / fuel flow / ISP bug.

Yup yup...
